actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Government Operations, S. Rept. 93-616.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-638.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Government Operations for inquiries and investigations by the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations.

summary.text: Increases to $1,956,000 (now $1,930,000) and $1,006,000 (now $980,000) the expenditures authorized for the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations of the Senate Committee on Government Operations to carry out its studies and investigations pursuant to S. Res. 46, 93d Congress.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Government Operations for inquiries and investigations by the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations.
